lead_paragraph: In her photos and her life, Genevieve Gaignard pushes against society’s beauty norms.

headline.print_headline: When the Body Becomes a Muse
headline.main: An Artist Stands Before Her Fun House Mirror

snippet: In her photos and her life, Genevieve Gaignard pushes against society’s beauty norms.
abstract: Profile of photographer, collagist and installation artist Genevieve Gaignard, who takes pictures of herself dressed as different alter egos and builds spaces they inhabit; self-portraits reflect her mixed-race background.
